name: Micro Adventure
overview: Originally created by Les Howarth and titled Micro Puzzle this game appeared in Weird Computer Games, a 1984 book of type-in games by Usborne Publishing. Graphics and new code was added by John Blythe of Rucksack Games who renamed it as Micro Adventure and released it on disk in 2019. It's an illustrated text adventure where you awaken to find yourself in a world where everything is of huge proportions.
